page.title: 09RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: Most people seem to like gardening; certainly the gardens are very well kept and look most attractive, especially in the summer months. There is a large field, with a cricket pavilion and the old village hall. Kilmington has a cricket club, a football club and some people belong to a golf club. Activities are arranged for all ages by the village hall committee and the school and include social, sporting and money-raising events. Many of the old people go to the Senior Circle,which meets every week in the village hall. A coach takes the children to Honiton swimming pool each week and there is weekly badminton, with coaching, in the hall. Brownies and guides meet every week.
